paragraphs.title: Imports
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import com.mapr.db._
import com.mapr.db.spark._
import com.mapr.db.spark.impl._
import com.mapr.db.spark.sql._

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import com.mapr.db._
import com.mapr.db.spark._
import com.mapr.db.spark.impl._
import com.mapr.db.spark.sql._

paragraphs.title: Define the Schema
paragraphs.text:
case class UberwId(_id: String, dt: java.sql.Timestamp, 
    lat: Double, lon: Double, base: String,cid: Integer, 
    clat: Double, clon: Double) extends Serializable  

  val schema = StructType(Array(
    StructField("_id", StringType, true),    
    StructField("dt", TimestampType, true),
    StructField("lat", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("lon", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("base", StringType, true),
    StructField("cid", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("clat", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("clon", DoubleType, true)
  ))

msg.data:
defined class UberwId
schema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(_id,StringType,true), StructField(dt,TimestampType,true), StructField(lat,DoubleType,true), StructField(lon,DoubleType,true), StructField(base,StringType,true), StructField(cid,IntegerType,true), StructField(clat,DoubleType,true), StructField(clon,DoubleType,true))

paragraphs.title: Load the Data from MapR-DB into a Dataset
paragraphs.text:
import com.mapr.db.spark._
val spark: SparkSession = SparkSession.builder().appName("uberread").getOrCreate()

var tableName: String = "/user/mapr/ubertable"
val df: Dataset[UberwId] = spark.loadFromMapRDB[UberwId](tableName, schema).as[UberwId]

df.createOrReplaceTempView("uber")

paragraphs.text: df.show

paragraphs.text: %sql select _id,  dt, cid,  lat, lon from uber limit 20

paragraphs.title: Which cluster locations have the highest number of pickups?
paragraphs.text: df.groupBy("cid").count().orderBy(desc( "count")).show(10)

paragraphs.title: What is the  trip count by cluster id
paragraphs.text: %sql select cid, count(*) as cnt from uber group by cid

paragraphs.title: Which hours have the highest pickups for cluster id 0 ?
paragraphs.text: z.show(df.filter($"_id" <= "1").select(hour($"dt").alias("hour"), $"cid").groupBy("hour","cid").agg(count("cid").alias("count")).orderBy(desc( "count")))

paragraphs.title: Query Plan shows projection and filter push down
paragraphs.text: df.filter($"_id" <= "1").select(hour($"dt").alias("hour"), $"cid").groupBy("hour","cid").agg(count("cid").alias("count")).orderBy(desc( "count")).explain

msg.data:
== Physical Plan ==
*(3) Sort [count#120L DESC NULLS LAST], true, 0
+- Exchange rangepartitioning(count#120L DESC NULLS LAST, 200)
   +- *(2) HashAggregate(keys=[hour#113, cid#5], functions=[count(cid#5)])
      +- Exchange hashpartitioning(hour#113, cid#5, 200)
         +- *(1) HashAggregate(keys=[hour#113, cid#5], functions=[partial_count(cid#5)])
            +- *(1) Project [hour(dt#1, Some(Etc/UTC)) AS hour#113, cid#5]
               +- *(1) Filter (isnotnull(_id#0) && (_id#0 <= 1))
                  +- *(1) Scan MapRDBRelation(/user/mapr/ubertable,StructType(StructField(_id,StringType,true), StructField(dt,TimestampType,true), StructField(lat,DoubleType,true), StructField(lon,DoubleType,true), StructField(base,StringType,true), StructField(cid,IntegerType,true), StructField(clat,DoubleType,true), StructField(clon,DoubleType,true)),MapRDBTableScanRDD[0] at RDD at MapRDBBaseRDD.scala:21,InsertOrReplace) [dt#1,cid#5,_id#0] PushedFilters: [IsNotNull(_id), LessThanOrEqual(_id,1)], ReadSchema: struct<dt:timestamp,cid:int,_id:string>

paragraphs.title: Which day, and hour have the highest number of pickups?
paragraphs.text: z.show(df.select( dayofmonth($"dt").alias("day"), hour($"dt").alias("hour"), $"cid").groupBy( "day", "hour", "cid").agg(count("cid").alias("count")).orderBy(desc( "count")).limit(5))

paragraphs.title: Which hours and Clusters have the highest pick ups?
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT hour(uber.dt) as hr,cid, count(cid) as ct FROM uber group By hour(uber.dt), cid

paragraphs.title: Which hours and clusters have the highest number of pickups?
paragraphs.text: df.select(hour($"dt").alias("hour"), $"cid").groupBy("hour","cid").agg(count("cid").alias("count")).orderBy(desc( "count")).show(5)

paragraphs.title: Which hours have the highest number of pickups?
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT hour(uber.dt) as hr,count(cid) as ct FROM uber group By hour(uber.dt)

paragraphs.title: Top 5 Cluster counts by hour
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT hour(uber.dt) as hr,cid, count(cid) as ct FROM uber where cid IN (0,5,6,13,16) group By hour(uber.dt),cid

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: How many trips in the most popular clusters during evening rush hour
paragraphs.text:
%sql 
SELECT hour(uber.dt) as hr, cid, count(cid) as ct FROM uber WHERE cid IN (0,5,6,13,16) and hour(uber.dt) IN (16,17,18,19) group By hour(uber.dt), cid order by hr, cid

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Calculate hourly window counts by cluster
paragraphs.text:
val countsDF = df.groupBy($"cid", window($"dt", "1 hour")).count()
countsDF.createOrReplaceTempView("uber_counts")

msg.data: countsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [cid: int, window: struct<start: timestamp, end: timestamp> ... 1 more field]

paragraphs.title: Show the latest hourly counts by cluster
paragraphs.text: %sql select * from uber_counts order by window desc limit 100

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Display datetime and cluster counts for Uber trips
paragraphs.text: %sql select cid, dt, count(cid) as count from uber group by dt, cid order by dt, cid limit 50

paragraphs.title: Load the Cluster Centers for plotting on a Map
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeansModel
val model = KMeansModel.load("/user/mapr/ubermodel")
model.clusterCenters.foreach(println)
val clusters = model.clusterCenters

val points = df.select("lat","lon", "cid").orderBy(desc("dt")).limit(50)

val parray = points.collect()

paragraphs.title: Bind Spark variables to Angular Javascript variables
paragraphs.text:
z.angularBind("centroid", clusters)
z.angularBind("locs", parray)

paragraphs.title: Display Cluster center Markers and Last 5000 trip locations on Map
